item.title: [sld] Demonlord Belzenlok
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Demon

Flying, trample

When Demonlord Belzenlok enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card, then put that card into your hand. If the card's mana value is 4 or greater, repeat this process. Demonlord Belzenlok deals 1 damage to you for each card put into your hand this way.

item.title: [sld] Razaketh, the Foulblooded
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, trample

Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Liliana's Contract
item.description:
Enchantment

When Liliana's Contract enters the battlefield, you draw four cards and you lose 4 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control four or more Demons with different names, you win the game.

item.title: [sld] Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying

Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [sld] Griselbrand
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying, lifelink

Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

item.title: [a22] Toralf's Disciple
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Haste

Whenever Toralf's Disciple's attacks, conjure four cards named Lightning Bolt into your library, then shuffle.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Patient Zero
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Lifelink

Damage isn't removed from creatures your opponents control during cleanup steps.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Ominous Traveler
item.description:
Creature — Human

When Ominous Traveler enters the battlefield, draft a card from Ominous Traveler's spellbook. That card perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell" and "When you cast this spell, return a card named Ominous Traveler you control to its owner's hand."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Gitrog, Horror of Zhava
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Frog Horror

Menace

At the beginning of each combat, if Gitrog, Horror of Zhava is untapped, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If they do, tap Gitrog, Horror of Zhava, then seek a land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, it perpetually gains "{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Draw a card."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Geistchanneler
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Geistchanneler enters the battlefield, choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand with mana value 3 or greater. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} less to cast."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Forsaken Crossroads
item.description:
Land

Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped.

As Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield, choose a color.

When Forsaken Crossroads enters the battlefield, scry 1. If you weren't the starting player, you may untap Forsaken Crossroads instead.

{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Begin Anew
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. Creature cards in your hand perpetually get +1/+1.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Absorb Energy
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. Cards in your hand that share a card type with that spell perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Ishkanah, Broodmother
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spider

Reach

Other spiders you control get +1/+2.

{1}{B/G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Draft a card from Ishkanah, Broodmother's spellbook.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Captain Eberhart
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Double strike

Spell cast from amount cards you drew this turn cost {1} less to cast.

Spells cast from among cards your opponents drew this turn cost {1} more to cast.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1222240116

item.title: [a22] Angel of Unity
item.description:
Creature — Angel Cleric

Flying, lifelink

Whenever Angel of Unity enters the battlefield or you cast a party spell, choose a party creature card in your hand. It perpetually gets +1/+1. (A party card or spell is a Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466777406119858184

item.title: [a22] Divine Purge
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile all artifacts and creatures with mana value 3 or less. They perpetually gain "This spell costs {2} more to cast" and "This permanent enters the battlefield tapped." For as long as each of them remain exiled, its owner may play it.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466788951386173443

item.title: [a22] Expedition Supplier
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Expedition Supplier or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, conjure a card named Utility Knife onto the battlefield. This ability only triggers once each turn.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466794761856200710

item.title: [a22] Slayer's Bounty
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Clue

When Slayer's Bounty enters the battlefield, look at the creature cards in target opponent's hand.

Whenever you sacrifice Slayer's Bounty or another Clue, draft a card from Slayer's Bounty's spellbook.

{2}, Slayer's Bounty: Draw a card.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466810308719165458

item.title: [a22] Sigardian Evangel
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Sigardian Evangel enters the battlefield, conjur a card named Sigardian Evangel into your hand. Discard that card at the beginning of your next untap step.

When Sigardian Evangel enters the battlefield, tap target permanent you don't control.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466824044515311616

item.title: [a22] Suntail Squadron
item.description:
Instant

Conjure a card named Suntail Squadron into your hand. if you have fewer than 7 cards in hand, repeat this process.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466837290236493824

item.title: [a22] Ethereal Escort
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Lifelink

Whenever Ethereal Escort enters the battlefield or attacks, choose a card in your hand. It perpetually gains lifelink.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466855383234973707

item.title: [a22] Faithful Disciple
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Vigilance

When Faithful Disciple dies, draft a card from Faithful Disciple's spellbook.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466870836745412612

item.title: [a22] Clone Crafter
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Clone Crafter enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of a random creature card from your opponent's library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spell mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466877879288016896

item.title: [a22] Inquisitor Captain
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Vigilance

When Inquisitor Captain enters the battlefield, if there are twenty or more creature cards with mana value 3 or less among cards in your graveyard, hand, or library, seek two creature cards with mana value 3 or less. Put one of them onto the battlefield and shuffle the other into your library.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466886220403851266

item.title: [a22] Discover the Formula
item.description:
Instant

Seek three nonland cards, then nonland cards in your hand perpetually gain "This spell costs {1} less to cast."

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466885907479416837

item.title: [a22] Angel of Eternal Dawn
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

When Angel of Eternal Dawn enters the battlefield, it becomes day.

It can't become night.

Your opponents can't cast spells with mana value greater than the number of turns they have begun.

https://twitter.com/coL_Amazonian/status/1466897032015228930

item.title: [a22] Geist of Regret
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

When Geist of Regret enters the battlefield, put a random instant card from your library into your graveyard. Then put a random sorcery card from your library into your graveyard.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard, copy that spell. You may chose new targets for the copy.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466897042039525378

item.title: [a22] Kindred Denial
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. Seek a card with the same mana value as that spell.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466905407226626058

item.title: [a22] Rimewall Protector
item.description:
Creature — Giant Wizard

Ward {1}

When Rimewall Protector enters the battlefield, each other Giant or Wizard you control and each Giant or Wizard card in your hand perpetually gains ward {1}.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466918887849660418

item.title: [a22] Obessive Collector
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Ward {2}

Whenever Obessive Collector deals combat damage to a player, seek a card with mana value equal to the number of cards in your hand.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466907442055462924

item.title: [a22] Tireless Angler
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever an Island enters the battlefield under your control, draft a card from Tireless Angler's spellbook.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466923075082067974

item.title: [a22] Sinister Reflections
item.description:
Instant

Conjure a duplicate of each of up to two target nontoken creature you control to your hand.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466921671189749760

item.title: [a22] Oglor, Devoted Assistant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Homunculus

At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library, then put one of them into your graveyard.

Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from your library, it perpetually gains "When this card leaves your graveyard, create a 2/2 tapped black Zombie creature token."

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466917627675217923

item.title: [a22] Unexpected Conversion
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw two cards. Then you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your hand. If you do, search your hand and library for any number of cards with the same name, exile them, then shuffle. Seek an instant or sorcery card for each card exiled from your hand this way.

https://twitter.com/covertgoblue/status/1466924889793867778

item.description:

({T}: Add {W}.)

item.title: [unf] Assembled Ensemble
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot Bard

Vigilance

Assembled Ensemble's power is equal to the number of Robots you control.

Whenever you cast a spell with an artifact creature in its art, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/unfinity-and-beyond-2021-11-29

item.title: [unf] Saw in Half
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their base power is half that creature's power their base toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/unfinity-and-beyond-2021-11-29

item.title: [unf] Killer Cosplay
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever Killer Cosplay becomes attached to a creature, choose a creature card name with an identical mana cost. That creature becomes a copy of the card with the chosen name until Killer Cosplay becomes unattached from it.

Equip {3}

item.title: [unf] The Space Family Goblinson
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Guest

The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.

Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

item.title: [unf] The Space Family Goblinson
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Guest

The Space Family Goblinson has trample as long as you've rolled three or more dice this turn.

Whenever you roll a die, put a +1/+1 counter on The Space Family Goblinson.

item.title: [unf] Hallowed Fountain
item.description:
Land — Plains Island

({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)

As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
